entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
